name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition
description: Windows Steam Version with DXVK and FAudio installed. Occasional stutter, but perfectly playable.
notes:
FAudio (https://github.com/Kron4ek/FAudio-Builds) installed - to address audio / script sync. problems.
 - Skyrim first-time setup will overwrite faudio files

ALSA - to get better sound (May differ for another system - try pulseaudio instead)

By sound issues try to change phonon VLC backend to Gstreamer backend.

input_menu.description: Don't launch skyrim yet, if steam.exe process will not exit, then kill him! Skyrim firsttime setup would overwrite faudio files.

content:
files:
- faudio: https://github.com/Kron4ek/FAudio-Builds/archive/master.zip
game:
  appid: 489830
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/prefix/FAudio-Builds-master/
    file: faudio
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/prefix/FAudio-Builds-master/wine_setup_faudio.sh
- input_menu:
    description: Don't launch skyrim yet, if steam.exe process will not exit, then
      kill him! Skyrim firsttime setup would overwrite faudio files.
    options:
    - ok: ok, I unterstand
- task:
    args: steam://rungameid/489830
    executable: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64/drive_c/Program
      Files (x86)/Steam/Steam.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- execute:
    env:
      WINEPREFIX: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    file: $GAMEDIR/prefix/FAudio-Builds-master/wine_setup_faudio.sh
    terminal: true
system:
  pulse_latency: true
winesteam:
  Audio: alsa
  OffscreenRenderingMode: backbuffer
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  quit_steam_on_exit: true
